mapper.select: select t.operatype,t.orderno,t.displayname,t.fieldname,t.isdisplay,t.points,t.aboutweight,t.quicksuggest,t.quicksuggesturl,t.writeable from m_configmodel_t t where t.operatype = #{operatype,jdbcType =VARCHAR} and t.points = #{points,jdbcType = VARCHAR} order by t.orderno asc
select to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') currtime from dual
